import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' const Addtask = ({addTask}) => { function submit(e){ e.preventDefault() if(!text){ alert('Please Enter the Title') } else{ addTask({text,day,time,reminder}) } setText('') setDay('') setTime('') setReminder(false) } return (
setText(e.target.value) } placeholder="Title"/>
setDay(e.target.value)}/>
setTime(e.target.value)}/>
setReminder(e.currentTarget.checked)}/>
) } export default Addtask
